name: Design System starter: NanoCube 2.0 (by NanoGiants)
description:
Our Design System Template is here! Build your first Design System with NanoCube, our Figma-Template.


Our template includes styles for web, iOS and android to allow for consistency across all platforms. We have designed the template in a way to guide you through the process of creating your first design system.


We regularly update the file. Let us know in the comments how we can improve!


——


Unser Design System Template ist da! Bau dein eigenes Design System ganz einfach mit NanoCube, unserem kostenfreien Figma-Template. Neben der Möglichkeit zur Individualisierung, legt NanoCube den Fokus auf maximale Konsistenz zwischen den verschiedenen Plattformen und enthält Komponenten für Web, iOS und Android.


——


NanoGiants – Choose to grow

Visit us on: https://nanogiants.de
